department.dept_long_name: Department of Romance Languages and Literatures

course.title: Introduction to French Literature I: From the Middle Ages to Eighteenth Century
course.meeting_text: M., W., at 11, and an additional weekly section hour to be arranged
course.description: Readings and discussion of texts of various genres representative of central trends in French literature from the Middle Ages through the 18th century. Emphasis on developing analytical skills by tracing the transformations of ethical, literary, philosophical and social currents.
course.prerequisites: A 50- or 60-level course in French; a score above 780 on the SAT II test or the Harvard Placement test; equivalent preparation; or permission of course head.
